Angel Cat：
Events to Join：
In the Lineage II world hunting monster, a chance to be in accordance with Was engraved with the text of the props. And those words brought me here to collect good I will send you based on a combination of text corresponding prizes!
There are 12 containing the text: A、C、E、F、G、I、L、N、O、S、T、II
These words can be combined into「LINEAGEII」Or「NCSOFT」， And the combination can exchange prizes are different. Even if the same Combination, according to the probability to get the prizes are different.
Introduction prizes：
Collected「LINEAGEII」, Can be one of the following prizes: - Pakistan temperature ring - Dusk weapons - Souhun stone - stage 14 - 16 - L2Day-blessed resurrection scroll 2 - L2Day-blessed return reel 2 - Super strong instant physical healing potion 5 - Text collector's gift
Collected「NCSOFT」, Can be one of the following prizes: - Giant ant queen ring - Twilight armor - Crystal Properties - L2Day-blessed resurrection scroll 2 - L2Day-blessed return reel 2 - Super strong instant physical healing potion 5 - Text collector's gift
